sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.mods

Interface IModdingProfile


  • public interface IModdingProfile
    Describes current set of mods that will be injected into JAR file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] changeMinecraftArguments(java.lang.String[] minecraftArguments)
      Minecraft arguments are arguments that will be available in minecraft's main method.
      java.io.File getCustomGameJar() 
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLastParameters() 
      java.lang.String getMainClass() 
      java.io.File[] injectAfterLibs(java.lang.String separator)
      Returns separator-separated list of absolute paths to JAR files that will be injected after libraries

      Returns separator-separated list of absolute paths to JAR files that will be injected before libraries

    • Method Detail

      • injectBeforeLibs

        java.io.File[] injectBeforeLibs(java.lang.String separator)
        Returns separator-separated list of absolute paths to JAR files that will be injected before libraries
        Parameters:
        separator - - String used to separate files
        Returns:
        Null for none.

      • injectAfterLibs

        java.io.File[] injectAfterLibs(java.lang.String separator)
        Returns separator-separated list of absolute paths to JAR files that will be injected after libraries
        Parameters:
        separator - - String used to separate files
        Returns:
        Null for none.

      • isLibraryAllowed

        boolean isLibraryAllowed(java.lang.String libraryName)
        Checks if this library should be loaded with our mods.
        Parameters:
        libraryName - - Name of library to test
        Returns:
        True if specified library may be injected along with all vanilla libraries

      • getCustomGameJar

        java.io.File getCustomGameJar()
        Returns:
        Custom game JAR file to use. If you don't want to change it, return null

      • getMainClass

        java.lang.String getMainClass()
        Returns:
        Name of main class to use while launching Minecraft.

      • changeMinecraftArguments

        java.lang.String[] changeMinecraftArguments(java.lang.String[] minecraftArguments)
        Minecraft arguments are arguments that will be available in minecraft's main method. These contain mostly user information, but also assets path, saves path etc, which might be useful...
        Parameters:
        minecraftArguments - Array of minecraft arguments created by launcher
        Returns:
        Array of string which is formatted in the same way as the input array. If you don't want to make any changes, return null or minecraftArguments

      • getLastParameters

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLastParameters()
        Returns:
        List of parameters that will be appended after all parameters to launch the JAR. These most likely won't influence the launching process, but you may find it useful...
